weWillAddYourName.message: We will add your name to the author list.

whatHappensNext.description: Heading for details of what happens next and when; the user has completed their task and has no further actions to take.

ableToSeePrereviewShortly.message: You’ll be able to see your name on the PREreview shortly.

closeWindowOrSeePrereview.message: You can close this window, or <link>see the PREreview</link>.

invitedToAppear.message: You’ve been invited to appear as an author on this PREreview.

weWillAskYouToLogInWithYourOrcid.message: We will ask you to log in with your ORCID iD. If you don’t have an iD, you can create one.

orcidExplainer.message: An <link>ORCID iD</link> is a unique identifier that distinguishes you from everyone with the same or similar name.

youCanDecline.message: You can decline this invitation and remain an anonymous author.

asYouHaveAlreadyStartedWeWillTakeYouToTh.message: As you’ve already started, we’ll take you to the next step so you can carry on.

unableToAddYourNameWorkHasBeenSaved.message: We were unable to add your name to the PREreview. We saved your work.

comeBackLater.message: Please try again later by coming back to this page.

getInTouch.message: If this problem persists, please <link>get in touch</link>.

youHaveDeclinedToAppearAsAuthor.message: You’ve declined to appear as an author on this PREreview.

readyToAddYourNameConfirmYourEmailFirst.message: We’re ready to add your name to the PREreview, but we need to confirm your email address first.

usedToContactYouAboutYourAccountAndPrere.message: We’ll only use this to contact you about your account and PREreviews.

whatEmailAddressShouldWeUse.message: What email address should we use?

selectTheEmailAddressYouWouldLikeToUse.message: Select the email address that you would like to use

enterAnEmailAddressInTheCorrectFormat.message: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

pleaseOpenLinkInEmailWeSentYou.message: Please open the email we sent to {contactEmailAddress} and follow the link. You’ll then be able to add your name to the PREreview.

onceVerifiedYouCanClosePage.message: Once your address is verified, you can close this page.

whatNameWouldYouLikeToUse.message: What name would you like to use?

youCanChooseBetweenOrcidNameAndPrereview.message: You can choose between the name on your ORCID record or your PREreview pseudonym.

pseudonymExplainer.message: A <definition>PREreview pseudonym</definition> is an alternate name you can use instead of your real name. It is unique and combines a random color and animal. Your pseudonym is ‘{userPseudonym}.’

whyUseAPseudonym.message: Using your pseudonym, you can contribute to open preprint review without fearing retribution or judgment that may occur when using your real name. However, using a pseudonym retains an element of accountability.

selectTheNameYouWouldLikeToUse.message: Select the name that you would like to use

weWillLinkYourPrereviewToYourOrcid.message: We’ll link your PREreview to your ORCID iD.

weWillOnlyLinkToOtherPseudonymPrereviews.message: We’ll only link your PREreview to others that also use your pseudonym.
